title: Happiness is Bliss & Hartsel, but no Barry
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Happiness is Bliss & Hartsel, but no Barry
posts.post_content:
A trifecta of respectable T206 cards are now for sale.

Jack Bliss has been graded VGEX+(55) by the folks at SGC.  Asking $66

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/24762/bliss[/IMG]

Admit it, that centering will knock your socks off.

Topsy Hartsel resides in a PSA 4 holder.  Asking $66

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10437/hartsel[/IMG]

A little registration color shift makes Topsy seem a bit tipsy.

Jack Barry is a real Polar Bear graded VG (3) by PSA.  SOLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10333/barry-j-pb[/IMG]

He's not bi-polar though, but well-centered.

Feel free to buy the remaining two for $127 or make an offer.  The last two digits of your offer do not need to match.;)

Check out my turkeys (T3s) available in the appropriate section.  I'm adding a Turkey a day until Thursday.:eek:
I can't believe everyone missed it, but there are two cards left.
